creator: sabreware@earthlink.net
text: <c:url> will not access resources under WEB-INF or its subdirectories.

creator: bayern@essentially.net
text:
<c:url> isn't designed to access anything; it just prints out a URL or stores 
it as a scoped variable, possibly assembling its <c:param> children.

creator: bayern@essentially.net
text: *** Bug 8049 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
